title: Killers Amongst Us: Murder on the Waxworm Farm (part 5)
itunes:title: Killers Amongst Us: Murder on the Waxworm Farm (part 5)
description:
A manhunt is launched for Lois Riess. She is a murder suspect in the deaths of her husband and now new friend Pamela Hutchinson. We find out she's made her way to Texas, just a few miles away from the Mexican border. Is another victim in Riess' sights?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
